applet_name: Get yourself out of an awkward situation (US Only)
applet_description: Run into someone that you really don't want to talk to? In a meeting that's dragging on far too long? This Applet offers a simple, discreet way to trigger a phone call (US Only) to yourself so that you can politely excuse yourself from the situation.

applet_name: Ask Alexa to call your phone
applet_description: Lost your phone? Say "Alexa, call my phone" and follow the ringtone. üôå

applet_name: Call your phone when your Amazon Alexa alarm goes off
applet_description: Use Alexa as your alarm, but don't have your Echo or Tap in the bedroom? This Applet will make sure you rise and shine. ‚òÄÔ∏è

This applet will place a call to your phone upon the press of a button widget. In order to ensure that you will be interrupted by the important phone call, it also sets your ringer volume to 100%. Just remember to turn it back down afterwards so you aren't interrupted for real during something important.

applet_name: Send a SMS to Get Called
applet_description: This is a perfect way to escape conversations. Text "#HELP" to IFTTT and you will receive a short call you can take out of the room.

applet_name: Get a phone call when your Blink Camera detects motions
applet_description: When motion is detected on your blink camera,you will get a phone call automatically.
Calls your phone when the doorbell rings. Choose the message.

applet_name: Call me when a water leak is detected
applet_description: Expand your Notion notifications with a phone call
IFTTT echo imitation
On a click of a button call a number
Say "Find my phone"

applet_description: Daily inspirational message to start the day. Include breath work, mental visualization, and poem by berton braley.
Call your phone (USA only).

applet_name: Automatically receive a motivating wake up call each morning
applet_description: Use IFTTT to automatically schedule a free wake-up call.
Hotel Wakeup Call
Call IFTTT throughout the week and get a digest of your thoughts each weekend
Message to self for end of day. At the end put the poem "The Dash Between The Years" found at the link provided...it serves as a good reminder of what's important in life.
Sets android phone to full volume and makes a call.
Call my phone when sensor tag is too wet. Please enable humidity or soil moisture monitoring from inside the Wireless Tag app beforehand for this to work.
applet_Trigger: Humidity or moisture is too high

applet_description: Call me on my phone when sensor tag is too dry. Please enable humidity or soil moisture monitoring from inside the Wireless Tag app beforehand for this to work.
applet_Trigger: Humidity or moisture is too low

applet_description: Press the iH button on your iHome device to call your phone. Please note, phone must be within range.
Get notified by phone call when temperature exceeds configured upper limit.
Useful if you want to get notified of freezing pipe
Text to add to Spotify
This is a quick tool that can give you a basic alarm system. It calls the contact you provide, and is great for vacations.
Calls your phone should wind speeds in your area rise above sixty miles per hour.

applet_name: Call Me When Door Is Open
applet_description: When tag in door mode or Reed sensor detects open, receive a phone call

applet_name: Call Me When Tag Is Moved
applet_description: When tag itself moves, receive a phone call
Double press my Flash button and rescue me from an uncomfortable personal interaction by calling me~
When infra-red sensor detects no movement or motion sensor tag stops moving after configured time-out, receive a phone call.
Ring your phone when you've lost it by pressing a button on Triby (US numbers only)
Add iOS Reminders by phone
Receive a phone call when the pressure rises above a value threshold you set. Great for those who suffer from pressure related migraines.
Have IFTTT call you when Apple's WWDC page updates.

applet_name: If door alarm, then call me
applet_description: Sometimes we forget things. Don't let a forgetful moment damage the contents of your fridge! Use this recipe to get called in the event your GE fridge door alarm triggers.

applet_name: Press Pop to find your phone!
applet_description: Press your POP switch to trigger a phone call to your phone. You can customize the message below, too. How about "You found me!"?

applet_name: Call to end a Harmony activity
applet_description: Call to end a Harmony activity

applet_name: Leave a voice memo on Evernote
applet_description: Ever had your hands full and couldn't quickly launch Evernote...then open the proper notebook...then leave a voice memo when you needed it?  Use this recipe to use Siri or similar service to call IFTT and leave a "voicemail" which then drops an mp3 file in the appropriate Evernote notebook of your choosing!  Like this idea?  Drop by WeLeadWorship.com and tell us!
applet_Action: Create an audio note from URL
